long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Advantages:
* Efficiency: Quickly manage and clean up your connections, saving you time and effort.
* User-Friendly: Designed with a straightforward interface for easy navigation and operation.
* Bulk Actions: Clean connections in one go.
* Instant Updates: Stay informed with real-time notifications about your actions and progress.
* Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly within your browser, ensuring a smooth user experience.

Note: This extension is not officially authorized or endorsed by LinkedIn, meaning it operates independently and is not affiliated with their services.
